title: Jinnah-Madani India Muslims Double Source MCQ 3

content.prompt: In the second half of the twentieth century, the kind of tensions illustrated by the two sources would most directly lead to the emergence of which of the following in postcolonial Asian and African states?

choices.label: Popular movements advocating the restoration of colonial rule

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
